projects.title: Shared Prompts
projects.description: Fullstack AI prompting tool for the modern world. Built to help users discover, create, and share creative prompts for artificial intelligence engineering.

projects.title: Sentinel
projects.description: This application is designed for administrators within an organization. It enables staff members to input prompts into a model, which then generates price predictions for their products based on the provided information

projects.title: CV Application
projects.description: This user-friendly tool simplifies the process of creating professional resumes. With a sleek and intuitive interface, users can easily input their personal details, work experience, and education.

projects.title: Rick N Morty Memo
projects.description: This application is a web based memory game that uses hooks to manage and utilize state while fetching and using data from an external API.

projects.title: Votify
projects.description: A voting web app based on US election. I designed the UI for mobile view and desktop view using Figma and directed the team that implemented the design and I also contributed to the development.

projects.title: Etch A Sketch
projects.description: This application is a browser based version of something between a sketchpad and an Etch-A-Sketch. This project significantly improved my ability to manipulate the Document Object Model (DOM).
